title: HoP 048 - Constitutional Conventions - Aristotle's Political Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 048 - Constitutional Conventions - Aristotle's Political Philosophy
description: Aristotle's Politics responds to Plato's Republic and sets out its own ideas about the ideal state, the types of political constitution, and the role of women and slaves
